issue.title: [C++] "WriteableFile" is misspelled, should be renamed "WritableFile" with deprecation for old name
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3190](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3190). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See e.g. https://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/nio/channels/WritableByteChannel.html

comments.body:
